awards.title: Best Paper in Social Studies
awards.description: What motivates people to work and improve their performance? What types of values influence working behavior of employees? How to diagnose corporate culture and environment? And what to do for better?

awards.title: Perm Mayor Award for Students achievements in Social Studies
awards.description: Recognition of successful contribution to students sociological studies as participating actively in various sociological conferences and events across Russia, publishing articles and demonstrating excellent study results.

projects.title: "7 stories about marketing and target audience", Right&Bright management school, Perm.
projects.description:
We know that Target audience is very important for our business success. We study our customers, immerse into their daily life and know what they buy and where to find them.. 
However.. How well do we know our customers? Our competitors? Our market?
Reality might be much different vs. what we think of it.
Seven stories about target audience and marketing:
1) Reach the stars: Who I am vs Who I want to be.
2) Wonderland: Your harvest is where you planted it.
3) Tilting windmills: Who are my competitors in reality?
4) Soldier’s letters: Choose your battle!
5) Forewarned is forearmed: Who are the real danger and why?
6) Little mouse in a small house: Niches that become trends.
7) A star is born: Entering market that doesn’t exist, yet.
Every story has its purpose! Learn and succeed!

projects.title: "Find your business idea and Start a Successful Business!", Interactive workshop at InnoProm 2016
projects.description:
Where to find ideas to start your business?
Key factors for starting a successful startup: 
- How to understand whether the market needs you?
- What do you need to know about your target audience?
- How to assess market potential of your business idea?
A full set of tools to start a successful business!

projects.title: "Finding and Understanding your Target Audience" at Marketing Wednesdays, Perm, Russia
projects.description:
Why one size doesn't fit everyone? And Why marketing should be targeted?
U&A and Segmentations: How to identify your target audience? How to understand what and to whom to sell?

projects.title: Guest lecture at Perm State Technical University "Market research for marketeers"
projects.description:
What future marketing professionals and market researchers should know about marketing research:
- Role of marketing research and analysis in business
- Key principles of successful marketing research
- Typical marketing objectives and questions of marketing research at various stages of product life cycle

Romir was one of the first Russian research companies that began conducting research projects via Internet in 1999. Currently, Romir together with partners combined have over 1M panelists in Russia.

Insights & Strategic recommendations built on leveraging results of Advanced Analytics studies, like Marketing Mix Modelling, Matched Panel Analysis, Assortment Optimisation studies, Demand forecast modelling etc.

profile_positions.description:

--- defining growth opportunities and Route to market, 
--- solutions to unlock performance bottleneckes, incl. Online & Offline
--- developing New launches & innovations, 
--- identifying new growth geographies and entering New markets,

On additional note: I truly enjoyed singing with Philips Christmas Choir!
profile_positions.title: Marketing Analysis Manager [a.i.], Domestic Appliances, Global HQ

profile_positions.title: Marketing & Brand Strategist

profile_positions.description:
=>	Developed agenda and protocols for 2 new trade studies to track and to grow efficiency of new launches and of field force
=>	Delivered consolidation & dissemination of insights on newly evolving segments to develop new products, to review strategy&portfolio and to grow the market (e.g. through leveraging negotiations with retailers, optimized merchandising, improved motivation system for trade organisation etc.)

profile_positions.title: BNLx Brand Research & Consumer insights

profile_positions.description:
=>Leveraged portfolio optimization and development of regional mid & long-term strategy for BAT WER through in-depth understanding of consumers transformation and evolving trends. 
- Leveraged development and launch  of several innovation products to grow share in strategic segments and to tap into new consumer trends, e.g. iSwitch, Additive Free [+0.4% increment to total market share in top-14 markets (’12 vs. ’10)].
- Facilitated “Re-inventing” of shopper marketing approach for leveraging success of new launches. Program was adopted and rolled-out globally.
=> Managing stakeholders across various functions and seniority level within and above region (30+ countries), incl. regional and local marketing directors
- Driving various strategic insights workstreams and market research projects across region
- Supported global & regional stakeholders in driving discussions with above industry organizations with regards to regulation concerning critical consumer segments and strategic products (Menthol, Fine-cut etc).
=> Regional custodian for research protocols & consumer insights, planning and budget management across region and suppliers. Trainings across & within region. 
- Delivered 100% compliance of BAT WER with regionally & globally developed and top-to-down escalated consumer insights agenda, research protocols, budget guidelines. 
- Supported smooth transformation of BAT way of working with agencies [transition from multiple to one supplier model] across region.

profile_positions.description:

=> Account manager for BAT Greece cluster: Supported optimization of portfolio and development of business decisions respond to strong changes of the market (price war, smoking bans, excise growth, recession).

Examples of supporting client:

-> Leveraged improvement of planning and forecasts quality through including impact of population migration on category market sizing & dynamics.
